ing: 1 (19 ounce) package JohnsonvilleÂ® Mild Italian Sausage Links, coin-sliced
des: "Italian night just got more delicious with the flavorful taste of Johnsonville Italian Sausage"
ins:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
In skillet, brown sausage in oil for 3-4 minutes. Add peppers, onion and garlic. Continue to cook until vegetables are tender.
Divide prepared pasta in bowls, top with marinara sauce and sausage vegetable mixture.
